mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM dr_pending_product AS pending_product

SELECT pending_product.pdt_id as pdtId, pending_product.pdt_no as pdtNo, pending_product.inst_id as instId, pending_product.pdt_name as pdtName, pending_product.pdt_icon as pdtIcon, pending_product.pdt_type as pdtType, pending_product.pdt_contract_id as pdtContract_id, pending_product.pdt_cycle as pdtCycle, pending_product.pdt_cycle_unit as pdtCycle_unit, pending_product.pdt_cycle_unit_days as pdtCycle_unit_days, pending_product.pdt_cycle_in_days as pdtCycle_in_days, pending_product.pdt_start_yield_type as pdtStart_yield_type, pending_product.pdt_confirm_date as pdtConfirm_date, pending_product.pdt_start_yield_date as pdtStart_yield_date, pending_product.pdt_start_allot_yield_date as pdtStart_allot_yield_date, pending_product.pdt_expire_date as pdtExpire_date, pending_product.pdt_refund_date as pdtRefund_date, pending_product.pdt_yield_count_type as pdtYield_count_type, pending_product.pdt_yield_type as pdtYield_type, pending_product.pdt_yield_mode as pdtYield_mode, pending_product.pdt_expect_yield_rate as pdtExpect_yield_rate, pending_product.pdt_guaranteed_yield_rate as pdtGuaranteed_yield_rate, pending_product.pdt_expect_yield_unit as pdtExpect_yield_unit, pending_product.pdt_stock_count as pdtStock_count, pending_product.pdt_reach_count as pdtReach_count, pending_product.pdt_min_order_count as pdtMin_order_count, pending_product.pdt_max_order_count as pdtMax_order_count, pending_product.pdt_person_limit_count as pdtPerson_limit_count, pending_product.pdt_unit_price as pdtUnit_price, pending_product.pdt_increase_unitcount as pdtIncrease_unitcount, pending_product.pdt_allow_advance_refund as pdtAllow_advance_refund, pending_product.pdt_advance_refund_fee as pdtAdvance_refund_fee, pending_product.pdt_onsale_time as pdtOnsale_time, pending_product.pdt_offsale_time as pdtOffsale_time, pending_product.pdt_expire_next_step as pdtExpire_next_step, pending_product.pdt_default_expire_next_step as pdtDefault_expire_next_step, pending_product.pdt_auto_confirm_order as pdtAuto_confirm_order, pending_product.pdt_instruction as pdtInstruction, pending_product.pdt_yield_instruction as pdtYield_instruction, pending_product.pdt_risk_instruction as pdtRisk_instruction, pending_product.pdt_need_risk_evaluation as pdtNeed_risk_evaluation, pending_product.pdt_risk_level as pdtRisk_level, pending_product.pdt_target_date as pdtTarget_date, pending_product.pdt_remark as pdtRemark, pending_product.pdt_operator as pdtOperator, pending_product.pdt_operator_remark as pdtOperator_remark, pending_product.pdt_status as pdtStatus, pending_product.pdt_createtime as pdtCreatetime, pending_product.pdt_modifytime as pdtModifytime FROM dr_pending_product AS pending_product WHERE pdt_id = #{pdtId}

pending_product.pdt_risk_level as pdtRisk_level, pending_product.pdt_target_date as pdtTarget_date, pending_product.pdt_remark as pdtRemark, pending_product.pdt_operator as pdtOperator, pending_product.pdt_operator_remark as pdtOperator_remark, pending_product.pdt_status as pdtStatus, pending_product.pdt_createtime as pdtCreatetime, pending_product.pdt_modifytime as pdtModifytime FROM dr_pending_product AS pending_product
